name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
description: The number of virtual CPU cores the MR AppMaster needs.

name: mapreduce.client.completion.pollinterval
description:
The interval (in milliseconds) between which the JobClient
    polls the MapReduce ApplicationMaster for updates about job status. You may want to
    set this to a lower value to make tests run faster on a single node system. Adjusting
    this value in production may lead to unwanted client-server traffic.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.

name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruct.write.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the EC reconstruction can utilize for writing.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.

name: dfs.datanode.data.write.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Specifies the maximum amount of bandwidth that the data transfering can utilize for writing block or pipeline
      recovery when
      BlockConstructionStage is PIPELINE_SETUP_APPEND_RECOVERY or PIPELINE_SETUP_STREAMING_RECOVERY.
      When the bandwidth value is zero, there is no limit.
